desc: The Writers Wright is a productivity coach, journal and notebook in one. It was specifically designed for writers to help focus their creative energy into a structured approach to careers, deadlines, drafts, idea generation and life. Bring method to the madness, strive in creative chaos and take your writing further.

layout.text: The Writer's Wright is a Productivity Coach, Career Planner, Journal & Notebook
specifically designed to help you reach your {writing} goals.
